heading: Strikes and lockouts.
general-note: Here are entered works on strikes and lockouts in general. Works on strikes in a particular industry are entered under the heading. Strikes and lockouts. subdivided by the industry or occupation and further subdivided by place if local, e.g.. Strikes and lockouts--Police; Strikes and lockouts--Railroads--France.. Works on individual strikes are entered under the heading for the name of the strike, e.g.. Coal Miners' Strike, U.S., 1949-1950..
